review:
I met the doctor for 10 mins during my scan. She was cordial. Although the root cause couldn't be identified at that moment but the doctor gave me few probable reasons.
However, the assistant to the doctor (dont know the name) on that very day of April 22nd, 2017, around 9:30-10 am was very very harsh and I'll mannered. She failed to manage the queue and behaved very badly to an extent that she said if you have an issue with your pregnancy you will have to wait for whole day long and what will I do then. The receptionist s on that floor still need to learn about customer service. Please train them properly. It affects the doctor s reputation indirectly.

Dr Shruti is extremely patient and calm Dr... 
She ensured that my scan is completely done even though my baby wasn't co-operating... Nose could not be seen as my decided to face towards my kidney and didn't buzz for quite some time.. 
Dr. Shruti gave enough time and called me for three times on the same day.. she advised to take a break and small walk and come back. 
Finally the face was visible and the nose bone was seen...

My appointment with Dr Shruti was for 11:45 AM on 6th Aug. I had a follow up appointment with another doctor planned in such a way that I could show the scan results to the next doctor. I had arrived at the doctors reception at 11:15 (half hour before appointment time) and informed the staff. But to my absolute dismay I was not called even after 10 mins after my appointment time. And when I checked with the staff at reception they were not willing to give any explanation other than to say there are 5-6 patients in the list. Finally I was called up 12:45 PM - one hour after the appointment time. And it’s not at all easy sitting in the uncomfortable waiting area benches with a pregnant wife. We missed the next doctors appointment due to this delay and had to stay back in the hospital till 4:30 in the evening to see the gynaecologist since she had gone for break. Over all a traumatic experience and I would strongly recommend people to stay away from the OAR Cloudnine. They don’t value people’s time and have very rude reception staff who treat patients with total disdain. Even when I demanded to speak to someone in charge of grievances they took half an hour to get someone to talk to me.  But no measures were taken to speeden up in the procedures. They simply don’t care about patients well being and I have already changed my future appointments. Will never think of coming back to this place which doesn’t treat customers with respect. 
The biggest joke was their phone customer service line. Someone picks up the phone and says everything will be alright and says they have limitations on helping us. So it’s better if you make some noise in the hospital itself. I’ve given up on this process.

Doctor didn't pay attention to our request for seeing baby's legs and hands. She said baby's position is not giving view of these parts and as the size is bigger now there is less space for baby to move and show parts. One nurse was constantly coming in and going out of the room during treatment  creating disturbance. ****** ****** *** ** **** *** **** ****** ******** ** ****** ** ****** ***** ****** **** **** She was in hurry and finished things in 5 minutes. A more caring and dedicated service was expected from cloud nine.

tags: Treatment satisfaction,Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Value for money,
review: This was for an early pregnancy intrauterine scan, to be specific. I had dey cough. Cough is not something that is under our control.. instead of waiting a few seconds, She clearly asked me not to cough. I controlled for  a minute with great difficulty and I asked her to allow me to cough for a few seconds. She didn’t allow didn’t stop, went on hastily and in urgency doing her scan on me dictating simultaneously as I coughed. The one typing the report could barely hear her. Within seconds she completed. Didn’t take a minute also. ******* ***** **** *****

I personally feel very satisfied,prompt,patient,of all very kind and professional .she was never patient lesayto answer my querys.i would definitely recommend to go ahead with her diagnosis.And feel myself lucky to place myself in her hands.Good luck all.

The doctor was not quite friendly and just mechanically did the anomaly scan and didn't explain what was happening for a longtime. The doctor who did my previous scan was very welcoming and explained and re assured a lot which was lacking in this doctor.

I had rushed to the hospital, as I had. To get a bead removed which was stuck in his nose, it was 9.30 pm so a lady doctor removed the bead in few minutes, but the charges was 1000 rs , they said bead removal charges was 500 rs and consultation charges 500, **** ****** *** ** **** ** ***** *** ** ************ ** ****  ** *** ******* *** *** ** *** ************* Not happy

Waiting time is almost 2 hrs. What is the use of appointment? Every time I visit cloudnine, I need to wait almost 2 hrs to meet the doctor. I don't understand y they can't improve it. Bad experience with wait time and counter staff has standard answer eveeytime, today there is delay :) Doc was good and friendly..

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review:
Doctor is interactive and answers for the queries .. she doesn't loose patience no matter how many ever questions are asked ..
Highly recommended..

review: It was a good experience...well explained by the doctor... satisfied with the service and care taken... doctor was very friendly...

Hi, my family's experience with Dr. Shruthi of Cloudnine Hospital has been great. ***** *** **** ************ *** ************* ** ****** ***** **** One must try and see for themselves. Everything was made so easy.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review: I felt comfortable talking to her and she was patient enough to answer my queries and to explain the risk factors. Personally I Highly recommend her

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very cordial gentle speaking doctor.Extremely patient.Would recommend to get all the scans during pregnancy done from her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,
review: Not at all patient friendly , not explaining anything and dint gave any instruction while taking scan and not bothering about patient pain or what they think  she is not  suggestible
Experience was good . Dr.Sruthi explained all the details of the scan and more over she is very friendly.Thanks to Shruti who made the scan a memorable one.
Doctor is friendly. Patiently did the scan. Gave proper advice. Overall good experience. I recommend her for scan

The doctor is vey good , she explains the scAn very nicely to me and it's very easy to get along with her .
She advises me with the correct time for conception. 

I would definitely recommend her for other patients..
The doctor explained the body parts and the movements of my baby while scanning which made us feel very good and excited. Kept me comfortable although the scanning.
Doctor was good and calm... She performed my NT scan in good way...Thanks doctor for your cooperation..
Long waiting time. had booked apoointment at 11 30 in the morning.. but finally the scan was done at 12 45.. not sure why theres so nich waiting even though the appontment time is confirmed

review: She is a good doctor who explains nicely during the scan.. I feel a lot comfortable with her.  During scan, the conversation are always positive and she says what to do or not if some issue is there.

review: Doctor didn't show up so much attitude and was ready to explain and clear whatever doubt we had . her attitude towards us was really appreciable
Explains the scan step by step to parent's as scan goes on. Takes ample time to insure and track baby's growth and normal condition while scanning.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Very friendly. Built confidence when my confidence is low. Will recommend to my friends as and when required.

Experience was good with dr I can refer to relative or family member as well as friend and Dr was also good and she is talking pollite way
Good, I recommend her. She makes you feel comfortable. And answers your questions with patience. She don't hurry.
I really appreciate the doctors effect and they treated me very nicely also I thanks to the nerses who treated me very well
Its good she is nice but she didnt explain any thing about the scan .that thing i dont like .other than she is good
She was very good at work and scanning .... but I feel she need to explain about scan and results .

Doctor is patient enough to complete the scan doesn't do the scan in hurry. Patiently waits for the baby to get into required position as required for the scan. 

Happy with the wait time and the detailed scan.

review: ********* ********* *** very cooperative physician. She explains all the things in the way patient can understand. Happy to visit physician.
Very dignified and polite. Explains the things very clearly. I recommend  the doctor for fetal scanning.

Doctor was very patient and calm. 
Our Baby was not co-operating for a scan, but we were called 3 times in a same day until baby co-operates. Doctor was so polite.
Doctors'Staff is friendly.
Overall I liked all the service. Right from Regiateration, appointment fixing, doctor scanning till billing
too long waiting in cloud9 hospital always .  even we book for particular time . we have to wait min 1hr 30min...

** ******* ***** ** * ****** *****  her behavior with patients is so friendly,  explaining everything  smoothly,  patient really will happy with doctor,  thanks a lot mam,  doctor always God for patient

Doctor is good but I have taken Appointment at 9 in the morning and had my scan done only by 11 it is so exhausting to wait for 2 hours. If time is not maintained there is no use of taking prior appointment and scheduling early for the same.

Slot was 9:30 we reached at 9:25 and scan happed at 10:35.
Let us look to appreciate doctor time and same way time for patient.
